attributes.action: officially recognise September  as ' IH Awareness month.'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our goal is to get September officially recognised as IH awareness month.
IH (Intracranial hypertension) is a rare incureable brain condition. It causes life altering disability. Most people have never heard of IH; including many in the medical proffession. This makes life very difficult for IH sufferers. We want to change this, and raise awareness about IH. The IH Research foundation are working hard to find better treatments and a cure for IH. Please help us by signing the petition. Thank You.
